interface.name: com.ubuntu.MenuRegistrar
interface.dox:d: An interface to register a menu from an application to be displayed in another window. This manages that association between processes and/or Mir surface IDs and the dbus address and object that provides the menus using the org.gtk.Menus interface.

method.name: RegisterAppMenu
method.dox:d:
Associates a gmenumodel with an application
/note this method assumes that the connection from the caller is the DBus connection to use for the object. Applications that use multiple DBus connections will need to ensure this method is called with the same connection that implements the object.

arg.name: pid
arg.dox:d: The process ID of the application for which the menu is associated

arg.name: menuObjectPath
arg.dox:d: The dbus path where the gmenumodel interface for the application menu has been exported

arg.name: actionObjectPath
arg.dox:d: The dbus path where the gactionmenu interface for the application menu actions has been exported

arg.name: service
arg.dox:d: The dbus conection name of the client application to be registered (e.g. :1.23 or org.example.service)

method.name: UnregisterAppMenu
method.dox:d: A method to allow removing an application menu from the database.

arg.name: pid
arg.dox:d: The process id of the application

arg.name: menuObjectPath
arg.dox:d: The dbus path for the registered application menu to be unregistered

method.name: RegisterSurfaceMenu
method.dox:d:
Associates a gmenumodel with a surface
/note this method assumes that the connection from the caller is the DBus connection to use for the object. Applications that use multiple DBus connections will need to ensure this method is called with the same connection that implements the object.

arg.name: surface
arg.dox:d: The surface ID of the surface

arg.name: menuObjectPath
arg.dox:d: The dbus path where the gmenumodel interface for the surface menu has been exported

arg.name: actionObjectPath
arg.dox:d: The dbus path where the gactionmenu interface for the surface menu actions has been exported

arg.name: service
arg.dox:d: The dbus conection name of the client application to be registered (e.g. :1.23 or org.example.service)

method.name: UnregisterSurfaceMenu
method.dox:d: A method to allow removing a surface menu from the database.

arg.name: surfaceId
arg.dox:d: The surface id of the surface

arg.name: menuObjectPath
arg.dox:d: The dbus path for the registered surface menu to be unregistered
